resultText: Both tools provide this equally well.

lovableDetails: Backend/Database: ⚠️ Requires Supabase, User Authentication: ⚠️ 30+ manual steps
resultText: Apper wins for simplicity and speed.

lovableDetails: Data Isolation: ❌ Manual RLS setup, Connection Pooling: ❌ Shared resources, Audit Logs: ❌ Requires setup

resultText: Apper wins with full no-code billing stack.
